unnormalised: Entertainment News: Guess who's been spotted getting cozy!
normalised: Entertainment News: Guess who is been spotted getting cozy!

unnormalised: Looks like sparks are flying between Bollywood heartthrob, Ranbir Kapoor, and rising star, Kiara Advani! Paparazzi caught them at a recent Diwali party hosted by Karan Johar at his Bandra residence. Sources say they arrived separately, Ranbir around 10:30 PM and Kiara a bit later, but were glued together all night!

Paparazzi caught them at a recent Diwali party hosted by Karan Johar at his Bandra residence. Sources say they arrived separately, Ranbir around ten thirty P M and Kiara a bit later, but were glued together all night!

unnormalised: Insiders claim they were laughing and whispering throughout the evening, and even shared a plate of jalebis. A source close to Ranbir revealed he’s been "smitten" with Kiara ever since they met at the NMACC gala on 31/03/2023. Is this the next big Bollywood romance?
